courseDescription:
This course, Microsoft Word 2013 Advanced, will provide you with an understanding of the advanced skills used in Microsoft Word. You will learn about collaborating on documents by modifying user information, comparing document changes, and reviewing a document. You will also learn about inserting ancillary tables and master document. You will be able to explain adding reference marks and notes. This includes captions, cross-referencing, bookmarks and and hyperlinks. You will also learn about footnotes and end notes as well as citation and bibliography.

This course then explains simplifying and managing long documents. You will learn about blank and cover pages and well as indexing a document and the table of contents . You will also learn about securing a document. This includes hiding information and formatting and restrictions. You will also learn about digital signatures and restricting document access.

This course then wraps up with forms. You will learn about using forms as well as manipulating forms. By taking this course you will learn the advanced skills and an tools used in Microsoft Word 2013. So why wait? Start learning today.
